title: Jerk lamb with chilli butternut squash and apple salad
description: This spicy lamb is best eaten outdoors, preferably with the lamb cooked on a barbecue.
ingredients: 1 scotch bonnet chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped
2 green chillies, seeds removed, finely chopped
400g/14oz butternut squash, peeled, cut into 1cm/½in cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 crisp apple, core removed, very finely sliced
1 frisée lettuce head, inner yellow leaves only, torn into small pieces
